text: Baltic News Network (BNN) is a news outlet founded on September 1, 2010 by Fred Zimmer. It is primarily reporting events in the Baltic states, including Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania. ==Mission== The BNN was set up to counter Russian disinformation to prevent it from influencing public opinion in the Baltic states. ==Languages== The site is available in English and Latvian. ==Related pages== * BBC * CNN * Deutsche Welle (DW) * Public Broadcasting of Latvia (LSM) ==References== Category:Latvia Category:Estonia Category:Lithuania Category:Baltic states Category:2010 establishments in Europe
title: Baltic News Network
